locations.title: Central Park
locations.description: A large public park in New York City.

locations.title: Eiffel Tower
locations.description: A wrought-iron lattice tower in Paris, France.

locations.title: Great Wall of China
locations.description: An ancient wall stretching across northern China.

locations.title: Mount Fuji
locations.description: Japan's tallest mountain, located southwest of Tokyo.

locations.title: Sydney Opera House
locations.description: An iconic performing arts center in Sydney, Australia.

locations.title: Taj Mahal
locations.description: A white marble mausoleum in Agra, India.

locations.title: Grand Canyon
locations.description: A massive canyon in Arizona, USA.

locations.title: Santorini
locations.description: A beautiful Greek island known for its whitewashed buildings.

locations.title: Banff National Park
locations.description: Canada's oldest national park, located in the Rocky Mountains.

locations.title: Machu Picchu
locations.description: An ancient Incan city located high in the Andes Mountains.

locations.title: Golden Gate Bridge
locations.description: A suspension bridge spanning the Golden Gate in San Francisco, USA.

locations.title: Colosseum
locations.description: A large amphitheater in Rome, Italy, dating back to ancient times.

locations.title: Niagara Falls
locations.description: A group of three waterfalls located between Canada and the USA.

locations.title: Bali
locations.description: A popular Indonesian island known for its beaches and temples.

locations.title: Kilimanjaro
locations.description: Africa's highest mountain, located in Tanzania.

locations.title: Great Barrier Reef
locations.description: The world's largest coral reef system, located off Australia's coast.

locations.title: Lake Louise
locations.description: A glacial lake in Banff National Park, Canada.
